`jeksterslabRsem` is a collection of functions that I find useful in studying structural equation modeling.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `jeksterslabRsem` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRsem) with:

```r
library(devtools)
install_github("jeksterslabds/jeksterslabRsem")
```

## Example

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslabds.github.io/jeksterslabRsem/index.html)
for package documentation.
